languages.text: "Притихли голосочки мои, затаились. Шепчутся где-то далеко, на самых задворках, словно робкий сквознячок шумит. Хотела бы сказать, что это не к добру, но хорошо-то как свои мысли снова слышать!"

traits.locale_text: "Притихли голосочки мои, затаились. Шепчутся где-то далеко, на самых задворках, словно робкий сквознячок шумит. Хотела бы сказать, что это не к добру, но хорошо-то как свои мысли снова слышать!"

languages.text: "My little voices have quietened down. They're lying low, whispering somewhere in the distance, like a draught sighing through the smallest crack. I suppose I should see it as a bad sign, but it's so nice to hear myself think again!"
languages.original_text: "Притихли голосочки мои, затаились. Шепчутся где-то далеко, на самых задворках, словно робкий сквознячок шумит. Хотела бы сказать, что это не к добру, но хорошо-то как свои мысли снова слышать!"

traits.locale_text: "My little voices have quietened down. They're lying low, whispering somewhere in the distance, like a draught sighing through the smallest crack. I suppose I should see it as a bad sign, but it's so nice to hear myself think again!"

"My little voices have quietened down. They're lying low, whispering somewhere in the distance, like a draught sighing through the smallest crack. I suppose I should see it as a bad sign, but it's so nice to hear myself think again!"

"My little voices have quietened down. They're lying low, whispering somewhere in the distance, like a draught sighing through the smallest crack. I suppose I should see it as a bad sign, but it's so nice to hear myself think again!"

"My little voices have quietened down. They're lying low, whispering somewhere in the distance, like a draught sighing through the smallest crack. I suppose I should see it as a bad sign, but it's so nice to hear myself think again!"

languages.text: “那些小小的声音已经安静下来了。它们压低了声音，在远处窃窃私语，仿佛气流从狭缝中吹过时发出的叹息。我觉得这恐怕不是什么好兆头。不过，能再次听到我自己思考的声音，这实在是太棒了！”
languages.original_text: "My little voices have quietened down. They're lying low, whispering somewhere in the distance, like a draught sighing through the smallest crack. I suppose I should see it as a bad sign, but it's so nice to hear myself think again!"

traits.locale_text: “那些小小的声音已经安静下来了。它们压低了声音，在远处窃窃私语，仿佛气流从狭缝中吹过时发出的叹息。我觉得这恐怕不是什么好兆头。不过，能再次听到我自己思考的声音，这实在是太棒了！”

languages.text: «Mis vocecitas se han calmado. Están acechando, susurrando algo en la distancia, como el viento silbando por la más ínfima rendija. Supongo que debería considerarlo mala señal, pero ¡me alivia mucho volver a oír mis pensamientos!».
languages.original_text: "My little voices have quietened down. They're lying low, whispering somewhere in the distance, like a draught sighing through the smallest crack. I suppose I should see it as a bad sign, but it's so nice to hear myself think again!"

traits.locale_text: «Mis vocecitas se han calmado. Están acechando, susurrando algo en la distancia, como el viento silbando por la más ínfima rendija. Supongo que debería considerarlo mala señal, pero ¡me alivia mucho volver a oír mis pensamientos!».

languages.text: 「小さな声は静かになった。小さな隙間から風が吹き込んでいるかのように、どこか遠くで密やかに眠っているように。これは悪い兆候だと捉えるべきなのでしょうけれど、自分の思考が聞こえるようになったのは良かったわ」
languages.original_text: "My little voices have quietened down. They're lying low, whispering somewhere in the distance, like a draught sighing through the smallest crack. I suppose I should see it as a bad sign, but it's so nice to hear myself think again!"

traits.locale_text: 「小さな声は静かになった。小さな隙間から風が吹き込んでいるかのように、どこか遠くで密やかに眠っているように。これは悪い兆候だと捉えるべきなのでしょうけれど、自分の思考が聞こえるようになったのは良かったわ」

languages.text: "Meine kleinen Stimmen sind verstummt. Sie halten sich bedeckt, flüstern irgendwo in der Ferne, wie ein Luftzug, der durch den kleinsten Riss zu singen vermag. Ich nehme an, ich sollte es als schlechtes Zeichen betrachten, aber es ist so schön, mich selbst wieder denken zu hören!"
languages.original_text: "My little voices have quietened down. They're lying low, whispering somewhere in the distance, like a draught sighing through the smallest crack. I suppose I should see it as a bad sign, but it's so nice to hear myself think again!"

traits.locale_text: "Meine kleinen Stimmen sind verstummt. Sie halten sich bedeckt, flüstern irgendwo in der Ferne, wie ein Luftzug, der durch den kleinsten Riss zu singen vermag. Ich nehme an, ich sollte es als schlechtes Zeichen betrachten, aber es ist so schön, mich selbst wieder denken zu hören!"

languages.text: « Les voix se sont calmées. Elles se font discrètes et murmurent au loin, tel un courant d'air qui se glisserait à travers une fissure. J'imagine que c'est mauvais signe, mais ça fait du bien de m'entendre penser ! »
languages.original_text: "My little voices have quietened down. They're lying low, whispering somewhere in the distance, like a draught sighing through the smallest crack. I suppose I should see it as a bad sign, but it's so nice to hear myself think again!"

traits.locale_text: « Les voix se sont calmées. Elles se font discrètes et murmurent au loin, tel un courant d'air qui se glisserait à travers une fissure. J'imagine que c'est mauvais signe, mais ça fait du bien de m'entendre penser ! »

languages.text: "Küçük seslerim suskunlaştı. Sindiler, uzakta bir yerden fısıldıyorlar, minicik bir çatlaktan esen hava akımı gibi. Galiba bu kötüye işaret ama yeniden düşüncelerimi duyabilmeyi de özlemişim!"
languages.original_text: "My little voices have quietened down. They're lying low, whispering somewhere in the distance, like a draught sighing through the smallest crack. I suppose I should see it as a bad sign, but it's so nice to hear myself think again!"

traits.locale_text: "Küçük seslerim suskunlaştı. Sindiler, uzakta bir yerden fısıldıyorlar, küçük bir çatlaktan esen hava akımı gibi. Sanırım bunu kötüye yormalıyım ama yeniden düşüncelerimi duyabilmek yine de çok güzel!"

languages.original_text: "My little voices have quietened down. They're lying low, whispering somewhere in the distance, like a draught sighing through the smallest crack. I suppose I should see it as a bad sign, but it's so nice to hear myself think again!"
